creator: Mid-day
newsArray.description: "It is an honour to play in Greater Noida and be part of such a historic moment for the city. We look forward to our days in the city with a lot of love from cricket fans who we know are here in plenty," Hashmatullah Shahidi

newsArray.description: From former England captain Kevin Pietersen to legendary Sri Lankan spinner Rangana Herath, many overseas stars have played in Duleep Trophy matches. Here's a look at the best XI of non-Indian players.

newsArray.title: WATCH | Sarfraz Khan Smashes Navdeep Saini For 5 Consecutive Boundaries In Duleep Trophy
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Sarfraz Khan Duleep Trophy 2024: Indian right-hand batsman Sarfraz Khan stole the limelight on Day 3 of India A Vs India B Duleep Trophy 2024 match, as the 26-year-old took compatriot Navdeep Saini on a ride.The wicketkeeper-batsman smashed the Indian right-hand pacer for 5 consecutive boundaries. The incident occured during the first over of Session 3 on Day 3, as India B made their intentions clear with the start of the final session.The 10th over of the 2nd innings produced 20 overs, and with that, it now stands as the most expensive over of the match.Watch the viral video here:4‚É£4‚É£4‚É£4‚É£4‚É£Sarfaraz Khan on üî•He hits five fours in an over, off Akash Deep!What delightful strokes üëå#DuleepTrophy | @IDFCFIRSTBankFollow the match ‚ñ∂Ô∏è https://t.co/eQyu38Erb1 pic.twitter.com/AWE5JhJiuS‚Äî BCCI Domestic (@BCCIdomestic) September 7, 2024 Rishabh Pant, Sarfraz Khan Rescue India B; Lead India A By 240 Runs At Stumps Day 3India B are on the cusp of smelling a memorable victory against India A, as at the end of Day 3's play, the side are holding an advantage of 240 runs. Conditions are getting worse to bat upon at M. Chnnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru, and the bigger the lead gets, the tougher it will be for India A to attain a victory.India B got off to a dismal start in their second innnings, as the side were reduced 22/3, which included the dismissal of Musheer Ahmed Khan, who scored a stunning 185 in the first innings.I.C.Y.M.IDhruv Jurel pulled off another stunner to dismiss the last innings centurion Musheer Khan üëåüëå#DuleepTrophy | @IDFCFIRSTBankFollow the match ‚ñ∂Ô∏è https://t.co/eQyu38Erb1 pic.twitter.com/6w5THkZElW‚Äî BCCI Domestic (@BCCIdomestic) September 7, 2024Swashbuckling hitting from Sarfraz Khan and Rishabh Pant guided India B out of trouble, and the latter scored a well-deserved half-century.50 for Rishabh Pant! üëåHe brings it up off just 34 balls üî•#DuleepTrophy | @IDFCFIRSTBankFollow the match ‚ñ∂Ô∏è https://t.co/eQyu38DTlt pic.twitter.com/OPSfsvFhqI‚Äî BCCI Domestic (@BCCIdomestic) September 7, 2024Stumps on Day 3!Another topsy-turvy day!Rishabh Pant (61 off 47) & Sarfaraz Khan's (46 off 36) counter-attacking knocks help India B recover and move to 150/6.They lead by 240 runs.#DuleepTrophy | @IDFCFIRSTBankFollow the match ‚ñ∂Ô∏è https://t.co/eQyu38Erb1 pic.twitter.com/MvpIk71uwf‚Äî BCCI Domestic (@BCCIdomestic) September 7, 2024

newsArray.title: Flintoff appointed England Lions head coach
creator: AFP
newsArray.description: Andrew Flintoff's cricket coaching career took another step forward Saturday when he was put in charge of the England Lions, the national 'A' side.The 46-year-old former all-rounder is currently with the Test side at the Oval for this week's series finale against Sri Lanka, standing in for batting coach Marcus Trescothick, and he has now agreed to take over the second-string Lions for the next four series.
